On 11 October 2017 at 06:42, sean_c4s@... [neat]
<neat@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
>
>
> Pictures:
> http://randomprojectionai.blogspot.com/2017/10/probing-deep-neural-networks.html
>

Thanks. What is the architecture of these networks? Obviously we we
can see the outputs (square grid of pixels), and know the network
depth for each pic. Sp e.g. are they convolutional nets? How many
input nodes are there? Are the nodes in each layer connected to all
other nodes in the next layer?

And what input vectors are you using? Randomly chosen vectors?

Also, by activation fn = Square do you mean the step function?

Regards,

Colin
